price: (Ànábì) ’Ibrọ̄hīm, ṣẹ́rí kúrò níbi èyí. Dájúdájú àṣẹ Olúwa rẹ ti dé. Àti pé dájúdájú àwọn (wọ̀nyẹn) ni ìyà tí kò ṣe é dá padà yóò dé bá.
arabic: يَٰٓإِبۡرَٰهِيمُ أَعۡرِضۡ عَنۡ هَٰذَآۖ إِنَّهُۥ قَدۡ جَآءَ أَمۡرُ رَبِّكَۖ وَإِنَّهُمۡ ءَاتِيهِمۡ عَذَابٌ غَيۡرُ مَرۡدُودٖ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: yāib'rāhīmu aʿriḍ ʿan hādhā innahu qad jāa amru rabbika wa-innahum ātīhim ʿadhābun ghayru mardūdin
